DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Photoirritation Potential PEP005 ( Ingenol Mebutate ) Gel , 0.01 % Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: healthy male female ; case females childbearing potential , must use effective contraception must provide negative pregnancy test ; must read , understand provide sign informed consent . willing refrain use topical/systemic analgesic within 72 hour prior study ; use systemic/locallyacting medication study within 2 week prior begin study ; use systemic/locallyacting antiinflammatories study within 72 hour prior begin study ; participate clinical test investigational drug within 28 day clinical patch application within 14 day prior enrollment currently participate clinical testing .
